content.text:
Goya created this work while <image 1>

A. in political exile in England
B. serving as a soldier on the front lines against France
C. working as the court painter to the king of Spain
D. studying Classical antiquity in Rome

The image you provided is one of Francisco Goya's famous "Los Caprichos" series, specifically Plate 43 titled "El sueño de la razón produce monstruos" (The sleep of reason produces monsters). This series was created during a time when Goya was working as the court painter to the king of Spain.

Therefore, the correct answer is:

C. working as the court painter to the king of Spain
Now, output the final answer and nothing else:
